Source.Name: gtksourceview
Source.Summary: Syntax highlighting text editing C library
Source.Description: GtkSourceView is a portable C library that extends the standard GTK+ framework for multiline text editing with support for configurable syntax highlighting, unlimited undo/redo, UTF-8 compliant caseless searching, printing and other features typical of a source code editor.
